page.title: 04 FARMING:ACREAGE FARMED
page.content: The farms in this area are:Rookery Farm-77acres;Webster's Farm-170acres; Moss House Farm-40acres;Mill House Farm -95acres;Promised Land Farm-60acres; White House Farm-200acres;Rainford Delph Farm-120acres;Guildhall-500acres; Great Houghwood-200acres;Rainford Brook Farm-60acres;Shaley Brow Farm-50acres. ALSO:Red Barn Farm;Barrow Farm;Gore's Farm;Pensylvania Farm;Mill Lane Farm; Hydes Brow Farm;King's Bridge Farm;Moss Lane Farm;Little Moss Farm;Myer's Farm; Alder Farm;Crank Hall Farm;King's Moss Farm.There is also a small mushroom farm. Most farms have some rented land and some are tenanted from Lord Derby or the Church Commission.Many of the farms are old - the oldest is Guildhall whose farmhouse is dated 1627.Great Houghwood Farmhouse probably dates back to the seventeenth century.
